sub_title: Adding value by building outcome focused product teams
summary:
Experienced leader with a passion for building teams and to help organizations to succeed with their (Agile & Digital) transformation ambitions. Focus on a systemic approach by connecting corporate vision, strategy and ambition to operational excellence in teams and individuals; Develop the ability to deliver value in the short term while building the necessary capabilities to succeed in the future.

Some key assets: 
===========
* Hands on Agile Coaching and Agile Delivery experience
* Setting up agile teams and helping clients to build agile capabilities
* Leadership with a strong facilitating character
* Experience in making ‘Agile’ transitions successful in competitive, non-Agile environments
* Expertise in integrating a variety of disciplines in teams, including strategy, user experience, front end development, back-end development, testing, DevOps and data science in teams and delivery streams
* Hands on product owner and scrum master experience in product development, service design and software implementation environments
* People (development) responsibility for teams and departments up to 80 people
* Specialized in (re)building software stacks from the ground up as well as turning around teams and projects which have gone bad (including fixing Agile transitions that seem to be ‘stuck’)
* Skilled in managing complex, international software delivery programs (with clients in Asia, Russia, Mexico, US / Canada) and teams with an international footprint; managing cultural differences
* Passionate about learning and developing myself and help others to build capabilities themselves and to grow 
* Alignment of business (strategy) and IT (execution) stakeholders to create sustainable results

education.field_of_study: ICAgile certifications: Leading with Agility (ICP-LEA)+ Coaching Agile Transitions (ICP-CAT)
